h2_title: Pale-Axe Stalwart Boss Fight and Guide
content: When you've knocked his health bar almost all the way down, he will kneel. To make the area safer, clear out the rest of the fighting Yaoguais, then approach the Pale-Axe Stalwart, who will now become an NPC with his own side quest for you to complete.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pale-Axe_Stalwart.md', within the main section titled 'Pale-Axe Stalwart', specifically from the subsection 'Pale-Axe Stalwart Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When you've knocked his health bar almost all the way down, he will kneel. To make the area safer, clear out the rest of the fighting Yaoguais, then approach the Pale-Axe Stalwart, who will now become an NPC with his own side quest for you to complete.
